author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-2450 fix issues from the RAT report

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-3642] Ported mergeId for build resources over from trunk (revId 673417) to provide a unique identifier for resources that will allow back-propagation of changed information from the concrete version of the build section given to the plugin, back to the dynamic version preserved for future plugin executions.

author: azeez
msg: Removing a thread.sleep, may need it on EC2 however. May be I should introduce a parameter in the axis2.xml file

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-3642] Adding internal-only unique id 'mergeId' to build resources, to allow back-propagation of changed resource information from plugin executions to the dynamic version of the POM build section. Also, modified the project-builder's dynamism methods (calculate*, restore*) to use mergeId.
